name: fancyBox 3 for WordPress
author: Web Programming Solutions

sections.description:
Seamlessly integrates the fancyBox 3 script into your WordPress installation: Upload, activate, and you’re done. Additional configuration is optional.

You can easily customize almost anything you can think about fancyBox lightbox. By default, the plugin will use jQuery to apply fancyBox to ANY thumbnails that link directly to an image. It will also automatically convert WordPress image galleries into fancyBox galleries.

For Inline content linking
– Create a link to any hidden or visible div with an ID attribate, and the plugin will transform the link and enable it for fancyBox usage.
– Note: this may cause a conflict if your page or website is using a smooth scrolling function to jump between page sections!

In upcoming versions, additional functionality for ajax calls and iframe data will be implemented.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the w3dev-fancybox folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s it: fancyBox will be automatically applied to all your image links and galleries.
  4. If you want to customize the look and feel of fancyBox, go to the Options Page under General Options in the WordPress Admin panel
sections.changelog:
1.2.4

  • Compatibility bump

1.2.3

  • Bug fixes
  • Upgraded fancyBox to v.3.3.5
  • fancyBox is now applied to all galleries on a page with separate IDs

1.2.2

  • Bug fix

1.2.1

  • Bug fix

1.2

  • Fixed a bug where text links pointing to images were not being enabled
  • Added support for Inline content

1.1.1

  • Moved fancyBox JS code to the footer

1.1

  • Fixed a lined of code where there was a short opening tag in PHP
  • Updated fancyBox 3 to the latest version, 3.2.10

1.0.1

  • Added functionality to toggle fancyBox functionality for images and and image galleries independently
  • Fixed a bug where the custom slide and container classes were not being added

1.0.0

Initial Release
sections.reviews:
The Best - Only one with Zoom Function!

By richardjamesw on August 27, 2019

Seems to be the only Fancybox plugin with an option for click to zoom after lighbox has popped up. So glad I finally found one that works! Rich

What a disaster (updated)

By abcdefghijklmnop on January 26, 2020

Works out of the box upon activation with latest version of WordPress (June 2018). Edit: Captions don't work. 1-2 days after installation, my slider stopped working. I then opened my site in Microsoft Edge to test it. Just before the site loaded, I saw some Russian words appear and then disappear. Immediately uninstalled and everything looks normal right now. Hope this didn't f*ck my site up. It is the only plugin installed besides the default Hello Dolly and Akismet. Edit 2: 26 Jan 2020. This remains the only plugin installed on my site and so far so good. I am sorry to the developer for the earlier bad review, I honestly thought there was something wrong with the plugin.

Super plugin

By makissm21 on June 9, 2018

Thanks for the job.

Simple Yet Functional

By Paul Scollon (scollonp) on April 20, 2018

Some of these fancybox plugins have nearly too many features, which means more things to go wrong. This one just does one thing, and does it well. Got me out of a jam for sure when another similar plugin just decided to start throwing javascript errors all over the console.

Great and easy plugin

By frietsje on April 10, 2018

Working for a while now with this plugin. Works easy and as you expect. Also fast support!

Works as a charm, clear code

By springm on February 27, 2018

This plugin does what it should, and in addition the code is very clear and beautiful, so I could easily patch in a functionality that I missed

Excellent

By psamathe on November 6, 2017

Excellent gallery system. Using the standard Wordpress [gallery] shorcode means great compatibility and if you do ever change, all your old posts will still work fine. Only reason for 4*s is the need for link="file" in the shortcode - but that's a minimal issue. Excellent support. Posted question and quickly answered and resolved. (And I regard Fancy Box 3 as massively superior to the previous Fancy Box releases - which I'd never used as I didn't like them, but version 3 is a massive improvement)
